Whatsapp Status helps us see the slide of services together towards a common vanilla where stories and statuses that expire within a day - these help the user to build their app interactions into their daily routines which can, in turn be processed by an algorithm. People's rhythyms can be sorted and segmented into suggestibility categories and their attention can likewise be packaged and sold by Facebook's marketing partners to the highest real time bidder.
